website_summaries.verdict: Though it costs a little more, this is a strong security cable with a high level of protection against tampering.
pros: Extremely easy to use and fits in place with a satisfying clicking noise, so you know it has been connected properly
Offered in versions for Apple laptops or standard laptops
Can pick between two thicknesses of security cable
Ships with two keys, just in case you lose one
cons: Must match with the model and brand of laptop you own

customer_reviews.title: High quality, easy to use. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality. The cable or lock mech could easily be cut, but the idea is to make the equipment "theft resistant" not "theft proof". My laptop is less easy to steal so hopefully a potential thief chooses just to move on to the next office. The permanently affixed security stud is very unobtrusive when not locked down. Slim and low-profile. The stud can be easily removed when not locked up (unscrewed with the provided allen wrench) so if you decide you don't need the lock anymore, it's a 30 second task to remove it. I'm really satisfied that I chose to spend the extra few dollars for this upgraded version.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Elegant Solution for my new iMac (Retina 5K, 27-inch, 2019)
customer_reviews.text: NOTE: This was bought for my iMac (Retina 5K, 27-inch, 2019) I've always had a laptop that I could stash in a safe when I wasn't at home, so I was kind of worried about getting a desktop computer that could stolen during a robbery. This solution puts me at ease. The cable is 1/4" braided steel cable encased in rubber. I have it looped around a let of my desk. If someone really wants it, they could probably figure-out a way to get it off or cut it free with the right tools, but it will definitely discourage a crash-and-grab from bothering and leave them with an XBOX or something I don't really care that much about.
customer_reviews.author: 0degreesk

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to handle
customer_reviews.text: The lock is very nice looking but Its not easy to lock and take it out. I had a tough time operating it and was wondering how to get it out of the computer. After several attempts I was able to get it out. I didn't want to buy something that was that hard to operate. Its a nice product but if the opening and closing were to be more easy, I will still go for it
customer_reviews.author: Tomy Abraham

customer_reviews.title: The best cable lock on the market for iMacs.
customer_reviews.text: The ultimate lock for your tricked out iMac. Put simply, there is no comparison between this lock and other on the market. Its thick security cable and connection to the iMac stand (as opposed to the small locking port) make this the only REAL option if you don't want your iMac to disappear. Sure, other locks will keep someone from just walking away with your workstation. This lock will make sure it can't be stolen. Good design with wire guides make the lock even better. The best cable lock on the market for iMacs.
customer_reviews.author: Mark E Strauss

customer_reviews.title: A Fine Lock - very easy to use and install
customer_reviews.text: A sturdy cable, two keys, and simple instructions. This device should fit any laptop, ultra book or tablet. Probably the most important feature is that to lock your computer onto the cable requires nothing more than a simple push to lock down your computer - no key or anything else is required to lock it down. Simply press the end of the cable lock onto the small knob (supplied) that you previously installed onto your computer and its locked. No effort! The key is only needed to unlock the cable. This simple type of connection ensures you won't get lazy about locking down your computer. I can't figure out what is not to like about this well designed system
customer_reviews.author: JustAnotherEngineer

customer_reviews.title: Great for what it's designed for
customer_reviews.text: Does the job to discourage opportunistic theft. The wrap tie is good quality, works well. I've used it every time I've taken it somewhere, and it works like new to this day. I use it at my desk, in the car when traveling, and even wrapped around a tree root at my favorite campsite. Note that it's a warded lock (not high security) and housing appears to be die-cast (metal not too strong). If a determined thief wants your laptop, they can get it, and quickly. A good quality cable shear would cut it in one second. Don't depend on it for more than it can do, but it's great for what it can.
customer_reviews.author: Sudarshan

customer_reviews.title: Works but inconvenient to use.
customer_reviews.text: It works fine, but the cable is quite stiff and harder to work with than a previous Kensington lock of mine. A bit of a hazard too as it likes to swing the heavy lock about. Also it can be a bit hard to unlock; takes 2 hands and generally I have to move the laptop about to remove the lock. I'd recommend a combo lock with a more flexible cable.
customer_reviews.author: H. Eck

customer_reviews.title: Best way to keep stuff from leaving!
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 of these incorporated into an A/V install. The projector and Monitor screen are hung above where people walk, and I don't want some well-intentioned "Helper" to take out a few screws and drop anything heavy on the floor/someones head. I realize the product is not load rated, but it is strong enough to keep a projector from falling 16 feet to the floor in a worst case scenario. I also have a computer that cannot move or the cables will pull out of the back. I use this to restrict the travel length of the machine. I have not had any trouble with disconnected cords since.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Krape

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: I really like the click on connetion. I may be emotionally tramatized by high school locker combination locks. Give the choice, I prefer not to have another combination to remember. Only warning is you don't need a key to connect this lock - it's main feature. That means if you forget the key, or swap cars with the wife and she has your key ring, you won't have a way to unlock the cable. The second key is of course in a safe place - at home. Hope I don't do that again. Otherwise, very nice lock with minimum of fuss to install and simple to use every day.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Strong lock, peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: I was really impressed with the quality of the lock. I was nervous purchasing without seeing or feeling the materials and construction, but I'm very happy with this. I also like that there is space for cords to still run out the hole. It feels MUCH sturdier than some of the other Mac Locks you can buy that go into the little locking holes on the devices. I hope to not need this lock to serve it's purpose, but its a nice mental reassurance to at least a bigger challenge for potential thieves.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Willow

customer_reviews.title: Blends perfectly with the design of my Imac
customer_reviews.text: Many people who have looked at my computer figure that this is part of the design. They don't know it's a lock. It blends perfectly. I drilled a hole in the top of my desk behind the computer and I have this security cable looped through itself and around one of the desk leg supports, so the cable is mostly hidden under the desk top. Great product and very secure
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and use. The only issue I has was after purchasing a new laptop, I wanted to move the lock over to that new laptop, but I couldn't find the tool needed to remove the piece of the lock that was attached to the old laptop. After lots of searching, I finally found it. This was my fault and there is nothing wrong with the product, just a word of warning to make sure you keep track of what you do with that tool... as well as your keys for unlocking :).
customer_reviews.author: T.H.O.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Fortunately I've never had anyone try to steal my computer. But I feel like if someone actually wanted to, it wouldn't be the lock that broke, it would be the plastic part of my computer that's attaching it to your laptop. The reason I took off the one star was because the stupid red clip thing that I thought would be useful for keeping the cords nicely rolled up can be really difficult to take off if you dont have anything on hand to help. I cut it off because of how annoying it was and since I never used it for anything.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Cardin

customer_reviews.title: Great phone tech support from Kensington
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased one of the Kensington model K64637WW ClickSafe laptop lock from Amazon.com. The package arrived with all parts and in working order. Unfortunately, before I was able to permanently attach the small security anchor to my laptop, I lost the anchor. I contacted Kensington tech support by phone and offered to purchase a replacement anchor. The support person was very helpful and sent me a replacement anchor for free. Once I got the replacment anchor attached to my notebook (After inserting into the lock slot, you have to rotate the outside of the anchor 90 degrees before tightening the internal Allen nut.), the quick attachment lock worked perfectly. I would definitely buy again from Kensington.
customer_reviews.author: Robert H.

customer_reviews.title: I used to hate Kensington cable locks until I bought the ClickSafe Keyed cable lock.
customer_reviews.text: The key is unique and very secure. The cable lock has little to no gap, yet rotates freely for use in almost any position. The cable is VERY thick and strong. The lock nub that attaches to my laptop is very small and unobtrusive. It does not get in the way of normal laptop use and doesn't inhibit slipping my laptop in my backpack. Plus, if you register, you have peace of mind that Kinsington will send you a replacement key for FREE if you lose both keys.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Impractical
customer_reviews.text: It’s just cumbersome enough to use that it’ll not practical for daily use
customer_reviews.author: SW

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to lock
customer_reviews.text: It's quite effortless to lock up my laptop at the coffee shop with this device. It is however a bit difficult to unlock it because the kensington lock attachment on my laptop points downward at maybe a 10 degree angle. While the lock doesn't touch the table, the key cannot be inserted into the lock to unlock it unless my laptop is at the edge of the table. It's only a slight annoyance and honestly most of the blame falls on HP for puting the lock at an angle.
customer_reviews.author: Carlin

customer_reviews.title: Cable looks impressive but isn't as strong due to the junction between it and the lock
customer_reviews.text: The cable is very strong and looks like it would hold quite well but the interface between the actual Kensington Lock and the cable is undoubtedly the weak point. In the end, I think the illusion that the item this cable secures, is likely more valuable than its real strength. In many ways I wish I would have gotten a thinner one as this is quite inflexible.
customer_reviews.author: GOKTGO

customer_reviews.title: Another brand I ripped out of the laptop and the combo locks go bad.
customer_reviews.text: Another brand that had a key I tripped over the cable and yanked it out of a dell laptop. So I had to find a better solution. Horror stories occurred on combo locks. This one holds a 90 degree position instead of spreading apart like other locks. This is a pivot where one fits in the first groove the other is making the other part of an X holding in place. Just follow the movie to install it. At the web sit write down the key number in the serial number so u can get a duplicate key made if u need to.
customer_reviews.author: StitchExperiment626

customer_reviews.title: Works good for me.
customer_reviews.text: I use this lock on my mac when i'm at the library. Granted, I don't leave my notebook unattended for long periods of time, but I think a thief would have to do something rather conspicuous to remove this lock and steal my computer. I remember that it took a little finagling to get the nub to fit into the security slot but once it was in it fit securely. It doesn't bother me at all that there is a little attachment permanently sticking out of my computer. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: Secure as a Brinks Truck
customer_reviews.text: Easy installation, but it takes pushing the lock hard into the hub which must be positioned just right to allow the connection. I never heard the "click" but it is secure. Once I figured that out - installations were a snap. We have several iMacs that need to be secured. The security cable is thicker than I had imagined, and looks more secure than any laptop security cables we have purchased. Works great for us.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Crayon

customer_reviews.title: Works great for light security
customer_reviews.text: Works great to secure, worth the investment. Lots of products actually are compatible with this lock
customer_reviews.author: Alpa Chino

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Install. Cheap peace-of-mind
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these for my office iMacs after a neighboring business experienced a "smash and grab" break-in. On one of my desks I had to drill a 1.5" hole to loop it through.Took about 3 minutes to install the others. Bolt cutters could probably get through it, but most crack heads don't carry bolt cutters with them.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Willis

customer_reviews.title: Probably the Best Most Affordable Laptop Lock
customer_reviews.text: PROS 1) It uses a long key, and not a round key that can be unlocked with the back part of a Bic pen. 2) It has a high quality look. 3) The cable is long enough so you can attach it to almost anything. CONS 1) The cable is a bit thin. I suppose it can be snapped with a large cable cutter, but at least it keeps most thieves away from my laptop while I'm not around.
customer_reviews.author: T. Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and seems secure
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this lock after trying a combination one first and disliking that one. I like this lock for it is easy and fast to lock/unlock once installed. Installation takes a few minutes (at least for me) and it leaves a small metal knob on the outside of the laptop case, which I personally do not mind as I do not use neoprene sleeve to carry my laptop, so extra protrusion on the side does not bother me. Overall, very nice product.
customer_reviews.author: W_tulip

customer_reviews.title: Very difficult to unlock
customer_reviews.text: This seems secure enough, but it is extremely frustrating to unlock. I have scratched up my computer quite a bit struggling with this thing. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: J. Simms

customer_reviews.title: Does its job, very secure
customer_reviews.text: The product isn't like most laptop locks as it has a nub that must be preinstalled onto the laptop. The nub is much more secure in my opinion and not too unsightly when not being used with the lock. The lock is very durable and so far I have not run into many issues. My favorite feature of this lock is that it is very quick to unlatch (due to the nub) especially when I am in a hurry. Kensington seems like the way to go especially when these laptop locks are generally called "Kensington Locks" and they are so for a reason.
customer_reviews.author: A.E.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Security Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid security product, although I used my own security screws, not the ones that came with the product ... But I’m very happy with it and feel my iMac is considerably safer from theft ...
customer_reviews.author: Stephen A. Caswell

customer_reviews.title: Works-ish.
customer_reviews.text: This works, but the lock mechanism is not perfect and we had a heap of trouble trying to unlock it the first few times. Not as simple as just throwing the key in and unlocking. You need to make sure the key is at a specific depth and you turn it just so and it comes unlocked. This was a fairly cheap item so I imagine you get what you paid for.
customer_reviews.author: A Person

customer_reviews.title: Great lock for iMac
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I was looking for and fits my iMac perfectly. It came with sifferend pieces so you could use it on different computers. Thankfully we've never had to test out how well it prevents theft, but the lock is sturdy and high quality.
customer_reviews.author: diamond417

customer_reviews.title: Snaps on -  Saves time
customer_reviews.text: Great lock and works similar to others sold by Kensington. The difference is the permanent "stub" you screw in for the "snap on" lock. It sticks out about half a CM which isn't a big deal to most people but if you have a tight fit laptop bag or case it might cause a problem. Snap on lock saves time and I don't have to get my key out every time I want to lock it up. Of course you do need the key to unlock it so if you're going to the library don't forget the key.
customer_reviews.author: Pratik88

customer_reviews.title: Prevent easy to grab electronic thefts in your home
customer_reviews.text: I feel much better having our apple computer secured to desk using this dome. Break-ins in our neighborhood focus on easy to grab electronics. I can't tether our i-pads but I could lock the computer up.
customer_reviews.author: PSchwinn

customer_reviews.title: Love this laptop lock!
customer_reviews.text: I decided to buy this laptop lock even though it is not the cheapest out there. I was reading the reviews carefully before selecting this so I decided to write a review myself. This lock is a great product. Locks very tightly. I think the piece that permanently attach to the laptop does the trick. It gives a tight lock and better security. Recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mike the tiger

customer_reviews.title: Hard to say "I Love It" to a laptop lock
customer_reviews.text: Hard to say "I Love It" to a laptop lock, but it certainly gets the job done. If someone REALLY wants to steal your computer, they'll get it. This is a solid deterrent though. Easy to put on and off and when it's not attached to the desk, the computer piece is very unobtrusive.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan H. Van Ness

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a Kensington lock that works on iMacs
customer_reviews.text: The previous generation, which employed bits that were left in the Kensington slot in the back of the display, were a total loss --- when attached to the lock itself, they'd just slip out. Although installation is a little dodgy (could use three hands), it's straightforward, effective, and securely locks the iMac. An added benefit of the hemispherical dome design is that 90% of the lock is inaccessible to tampering.
customer_reviews.author: sunman42

customer_reviews.title: Feels Secure and Install Was Easy
customer_reviews.text: Install was pretty easy. I've only removed it once since I purchased it to add more RAM to my iMac. It certainly feels very sturdy and secure. I'm happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MoCee

customer_reviews.title: Like the ease of attachment and the ease of use ...
customer_reviews.text: A little shorter than I expected, but fits the laptop I am using quite well, and even uses a disk-type lock and key system making it more difficult to pick. Like the ease of attachment and the ease of use for the application I am using it in. Easy enough to work and the shipment was fast and accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan K.Top Contributor: Pokémon

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love the custom fit with the Mac desktop computers
customer_reviews.text: Had no clue these were available. Absolutely love the custom fit with the Mac desktop computers.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Selter

customer_reviews.title: Great lock and great price
customer_reviews.text: Great lock at at great price. Needed a lock for my computer. Went to Staples and got a combo lock for $32. It was loose and I didn't like it. This was about 1/2 the price but better features. No looseness at the computer area where you lock it. Easy to install. Has a key which I think is better than a combo lock. But that's just me. I think the main benefit is that the small "button" that you put in the "lock" area really makes the lock tight when you "plug it in". I would buy it again or recommend it to family.
customer_reviews.author: XTATP

customer_reviews.title: 5 star
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 2017 imac 27’ 5k. Very sturdy. Comes with an ultra kensington clicksafe lock. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Paco Gamino

customer_reviews.title: Not retractable but fits in a laptop bag fine and good to have a spare key
customer_reviews.text: Not retractable but fits in a laptop bag fine and good to have a spare key. Good enough for a deterrent for when you need a small break or run a small errand.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Park

customer_reviews.title: Strong long cable, strange key not so easy to break.
customer_reviews.text: I looked for a sturdy cable for an expensive laptop. This has done the job. Easy to fit and remove.
customer_reviews.author: Cuitlahuac

customer_reviews.title: My notebook must be in the 1%
customer_reviews.text: This lock claims to work with 99% of the notebooks out there. Evidently my HP Probook 4530s is in the 1%. The little button thingy fits in the "universal" slot on the computer, but will not rotate the full 90 degrees necessary to tighten it into position. I tried it on my Dell flatscreen monitor, and it works just fine, so there is a problem with the HP laptop that prevents the necessary rotation of the gizmo.
customer_reviews.author: PackerFan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent kensington lock
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to fit with a landing zone dock I bought for a macbook air (can't believe apple took away the kensington lock fitting on the new MacBooks), the way that the dock articulates the hole with the locking mechanism means you can leave the little nub in and attach the cable easily. The nub attaches easily and stays on, little sticky to attach/detach the cable, but still highly recommend this lock. Of course it is unlikely to stop a determined thief, though i consider this more a visual deterrent for an opportunistic thief; nonetheless, it gives me peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: K. Gupta

customer_reviews.title: Laptop Security is Important
customer_reviews.text: I was recently burglarized. The thief had a short time window and when I got home I just missed him. . Now I have a new laptop and the Kensington will secure it. This may not be full proof but it will slow the thief down. It was easy to install, If you register it you will be able to get a replacement key if the original is lost.
customer_reviews.author: Jawad

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Steel Cable
customer_reviews.text: I just installed this cable and it works great. High quality and does exactly what I want it to, protect my iMac.
customer_reviews.author: svitiel

customer_reviews.title: Quality built lock and cable kit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to secure a mobile safe for travel. Since the Kensington cable kit arrived first, I've attached it to my laptop computer. I'm impressed with the two axis swivel on the lock, which prevents the cable from binding the computer after the lock is on. The coating over the cable and two cable collars thoroughly covers the metal to prohibit scratches on the equipment you're trying to secure, as well as the equipment's anchor. The cable will not stop a thief with large cable cutters or the tools to remove the anchor, but spontaneous theft should be thwarted. It does occur to me that a thwarted theft might turn into vandalism though.
customer_reviews.author: rvrider

customer_reviews.title: An effective deterrent
customer_reviews.text: This lock seems to do a good job of securing an iMac. It's really just a deterrent since someone can cut the cable and take the Mac still, but in conjunction with a home alarm system, it should at least prevent a "smash and grab."
customer_reviews.author: Justin W Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it very much since I'm always carrying my computer everywhere with me and it doesn't stay in one place for too long but when I do use it, it's hard for people to take it away. Someone decided to take my usb over my laptop because of the lock so even when I don't use it much, it's helped a lot. Definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Gama

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made material
customer_reviews.text: Lock does not fit into Dell Latitude. Has to wait for anchor adaptor. Keys cannot unlock the lock.... Good warranty. Company still provide replacement after 5 years....
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Merton

customer_reviews.title: easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: After several house burglaries in my neighborhood where laptops, external hard drives, phones and other electronics were stolen - I decided it is time to secure my devices a lot better - this cable was supremely easy to use - just make sure you have a 1.5 mm allen wrench on hand before you try to install it!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: This seems like a great product
customer_reviews.text: This seems like a great product, I was planning to use it on my Granddaughter's new MacBook Pro retina, but when I bought her the macbook there is no place to mount it. Returning online purchases is a hassle, so I guess I have to bite the bullet and live with it.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: Great for office use
customer_reviews.text: I use my Macbook Pro at work and was concerned about leaving it unattended at times I had to step out of the office. This tether is great. Installation was easy. The nib that protrudes doesn't bother me and the machine still fits in my case. I do find the key mechanism to be a little finicky at times.
customer_reviews.author: admin

customer_reviews.title: Seems solid enough
customer_reviews.text: Well... In all honesty, I've only used it a couple of times to lock up my laptop in public and each time, I came back to my laptop (within 2-3 minutes) with it still there. Overall, the thing seems solid enough and the lock doesn't feel flimsy like it does on some of these locks...I really have nothing bad to say about it.
customer_reviews.author: Egor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for an alienware custom gaming laptop which ran roughly $2000.00 us , for when I take it to work , this cable lock system just rocks I no longer worry if I have to walk away from my rig for a bit before returning , highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Duane C

customer_reviews.title: Completely worthless
customer_reviews.text: If you thought that being able to pick a lock like the Kensington 64068F with a rolled up piece of paper was bad, wait until you see this lock. Yes it has a "normal" key. Yes it uses a better attachment point on the laptop. NO it won't prevent theft! The point where the cable attaches to the lock is so weak that I can flex it with my hands - no tools required. One sharp rap on the cable at the point where it meets the lock will free it from the lock. Laptop gone.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: It worked really well. I just wish the cable ...
customer_reviews.text: It worked really well. I just wish the cable was longer because when using it on a laptop on a moving laptop table, you can only move so far. So we have to unlock it just to be flexible enough to move about the room with the laptop on the table.
customer_reviews.author: mcpopp

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with Lenovo P500
customer_reviews.text: The Lenovo IdeaPad P500 has concave sides, so the security anchor is just a little to low for the lock to latch properly; make sure the kensington slot in your computer is on a flat side before ordering. The cable/lock itself are of good quality and had no fault in this product not working for me thus 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for college student
customer_reviews.text: I use this for college to lock my laptop when I am not in dorm room and it works perfect! I love the fact that you just put the piece in the laptop and it always stays in, and the quick connect pops in and locks quickly. I would highly recommend this!!
customer_reviews.author: C.B.M. Industries

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient.
customer_reviews.text: Works as intended. Only problem i had with it was this: If tightened to much on my laptop, the lock wont wrap around the peg securely...it has the appearance of being connected right, but if you pull up or down on the lock itself, it does come loose. Ive fixed the problem by loosening the bolt a bit.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Just What Is Needed
customer_reviews.text: Great and easy addition to college student's laptop in the dorm or the library. Simple to install - the "lug" that remains on the computer is very small and will not interfere with anything. Easy to lock and unlock means that it will get used.
customer_reviews.author: Hank Reardon

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and very easy to install
customer_reviews.text: It works perfectly. It's not a very thick cable but I don't think it was attended to provide high security but merely a decent deterrent. The size also makes it easier to lug around if I needed to, but I leave it on my laptop at my open office nearly all of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Chou

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great lock. I had someone try to steal my laptop in the library. Didn't happen. Thanks Kensington!
customer_reviews.author: RickM

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Locking Device - Even for home
customer_reviews.text: It was very easy to install and rather inconspicuously secures the computer. The SafeDome design also secures my Thunderbolt cable. One may not think to secure a desk top computer in a home as I did. After a burglary one thinks again. I recommend this product for the iMac. If it had a combination lock I'd give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Lock
customer_reviews.text: This keyed laptop lock is awesome! It works so much better than the combination locks, at least the one I tried to use. It was well worth the extra money it cost. The nub sticking out of the laptop has not bothered me at all. There is only one potential problem that might occur if you're not careful, and that is losing the key to open it. So far that hasn't happened. I have one on my key ring and the other in another location. Anyway, I highly recommend purchasing this lock.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Love this lock
customer_reviews.text: Love this lock. Could somebody still steal it...well yes but not without ruining the unit. Makes your laptop less of a temptation.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: If you have a Kensington lock this is the one to use
customer_reviews.text: superb use although it works so well and easy I question if thief's can thwart it, I am no expert but ease and security are top notch.
customer_reviews.author: Electron Bill

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: I just go it today and it seems to be working fine with my new Asus g751. Very easy to use, but expensive. That's what you get when you buy a "Mac" intended product
customer_reviews.author: The_nolastnam

customer_reviews.title: this is shown to be a nice aluminum silver to compliment the macs design
customer_reviews.text: Do not be fooled it does NOT match the paint at all,, this is shown to be a nice aluminum silver to compliment the macs design,,, IN REALITY ,,, it is an ugly highly reflective steel,,, also to be honest while I don't wanna test it ,, I'm almost positive i could snap this out with enough force.
customer_reviews.author: ernie's Tattooland

customer_reviews.title: Great travel lock
customer_reviews.text: Great travel lock, always carry it when I travel with my work laptop. Never had any issues (I guess if someone really wants to steal your laptop they can probably cut through it), but it gives me nice peace of mind when I have to walk away from my laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Michael

customer_reviews.title: Nice secure cable
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. The lock secures firmly to my laptop. I like the keys too - slim and differentiable on the keychain. Wish the cable was a few inches longer. The instructions to get it set up need to be better - I had problems until I found how to do it online based on other users' experience. Overall a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Richard H. Lo

customer_reviews.title: Good security measure
customer_reviews.text: If you leave your laptop on a desk or table for long periods of time, this lock will discourage theft. If you don't want to remember number combinations then this keyed lock is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Singleviking

customer_reviews.title: May not fit all laptops.
customer_reviews.text: I won't be deducting any stars for it not working with my laptop. It is a well built product and works on my older laptop but I don't think anyone would want to steal that one. Just a bit of warning, any laptops with a lip around where you attach the lock will not be compatible with this product. I have a Lenovo Y40-80.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn D.

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Would be nice if a different technique was used to connect as opposed to having an exposed connector. I did know this is how it worked, and it is pretty convenient to connect and remove, so, it works pretty well and I'd recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Solved the problem of someone breaking into my office and stealing my iMac. Thankful to have a found something specifically for my iMac.
customer_reviews.author: Kaye Atkins

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this on my home equipment and the 'lock' part that attaches separately to the item you wish to secure holds pretty good. I like that it uses a key vs a combination. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: DJ MinWah

customer_reviews.title: Kensington laptop lock works great
customer_reviews.text: Simple to connect to computer and will give me peace of mind when using in library, that when I walk to the stacks my laptop will still be there when I get back. Made very sturdily.
customer_reviews.author: Egret

customer_reviews.title: does the job great!
customer_reviews.text: We needed a computer that sits in a public area to be secured and this works perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Institute for Energy Solutions

customer_reviews.title: Good quality cable
customer_reviews.text: This locking mechanism of this lock is very quick and easy to use. I do not have to worry too much about my laptop being stolen when it is locked to the table.
customer_reviews.author: Mooshu

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution!
customer_reviews.text: Really i'm not sure whats up with all theose reviews saying how difficult this is to install or use.... Took me literally 15 seconds to put in, turn, and tighten. Locks very securely and can't be jiggled open no matter how you try. Best lock i've owned by FAR!
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: Feels safe
customer_reviews.text: I work in a grad student office that is accessible to many (including undergrads upset about their grades lol) and has had problems with theft. I needed to lock up my computer monitor, and this works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: A. Patch

customer_reviews.title: Works just fine on my Dell Laptop
customer_reviews.text: Works just fine on my Dell Laptop; of course I've only used it in Library and Archives and I doubt I would find any thieves there but I felt secure leaving it sitting on the table top while I browsed for what I was researching
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to install the part to my laptop. Watch the video and it will be easy to install.. So far my laptop hasn't been stolen,..soo not sure if it works.. but it makes me feel better that if someone tries to steal it, that it will take them some time to do it.
customer_reviews.author: GettoLoser

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install with a good, strong cable. I would take away 1/2 star for cable management. I was unable to run all my cables through the cable management space provided. However, I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Never EVER purchase this product!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I installed this lock on my laptop and now it is stuck. Neither of the keys work. I tried to call Kensington to see if they could help my situation and they said I would just have to visit a locksmith to have it removed. I wasted $32 on this thing, and I'm not sure if I will be able to get my money back because I can't take it off. Save your money and your trouble. This lock is AWFUL.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Probably the most useful laptop lock
customer_reviews.text: This laptop lock compared to previous iterations of kensington locks is hands down the winner. While the button that is left in the security slot may interfere with some of the form fitting sleeves, it makes it much quicker and secure while putting less wear on the computer body and surround. The keys are also a great size and while this is only a deterrent, this lock comes in at the top of my list.
customer_reviews.author: Dominic Beckmann

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, but thin cable... probably easy to cut
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, but thin cable... probably easy to cut
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey L.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works!! I still have my UltraBook. This little charm deters any snatch and grabber!
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for college dorm to keep computer secure
customer_reviews.text: This item is totally what we needed and met all my expectations. Perfect for college dorm to keep computer secure. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bestmom

customer_reviews.title: Well-Designed and Effective Security for Your iMac
customer_reviews.text: I use this device to secure my iMac to my desk, and it is well-designed, and fairly sleek in its appearance. The cut-away section in the side could be a bit larger, so you could fit more than just 4 cords through it... and it should ideally have a rubberized inner-ring so it would not slip around so loosely... in my opinion... but I"m splitting hairs. To be fair this is an excellent product, and there is nothing like it on the market.
customer_reviews.author: JLJ

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: I probably won't use this laptop lock very much but I wanted one just in case. High quality and easy to use. The little nub mounted on my laptop is no big deal for me.
customer_reviews.author: Bagman57

customer_reviews.title: iMac ONLY
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why this information isn't publicly available since I don't think it's intuitive at all, but this DOES NOT WORK for apple display monitors. iMac only. Hmph.
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: It works ...
customer_reviews.text: This product works as it was intended. Even though no product is ever absolutely safe from burglars at minimum the burglars will need to bring Lock cutters so they would need to work for it. Robbers are lazy people that don't want to work, they usually go for the easy...
customer_reviews.author: J. Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great! We purchased this for my daughter's college dorm room. It is doing it's job. She seems to be pleased with everything that we had to purchase for her room.
customer_reviews.author: keepingitreal

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Deal with - Important for Students on the Run
customer_reviews.text: This particular lock is recommended specifically by the security department of my daughter's university. It's easy to use, and your laptop is there for you when you need it most!
customer_reviews.author: T J Wags

customer_reviews.title: If you value your iMac Pro, then this is the way to go!
customer_reviews.text: It looks good and fits the stand perfectly and you can rest assured that your hardware its safe!
customer_reviews.author: ronald yates

customer_reviews.title: easy to install - simple to use
customer_reviews.text: Protection: Sturdy, well built. Rare: 5/5 Folding: the protective cover of the cable itself makes it a bit springy.(it does come with a strap that I do not use out of laziness) 3/5 Ease of installation: took me less then a minute to install on a mac book pro 13" 5/5 Ease of use: just one click and you're protected. excellent lock mechanism makes it easy to unlock (if you have the key) 5/5
customer_reviews.author: Ram

customer_reviews.title: Good product and service
customer_reviews.text: Works well. When my son got a new laptop Kensington sent a replacement lug for free.
customer_reviews.author: dbroper

customer_reviews.title: works great, we have not had anything stolen since installing ...
customer_reviews.text: As advertised, works great, we have not had anything stolen since installing these, great price.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Marthers

customer_reviews.title: ... using this for the past 4 years and it's pretty reliable. I use this in my room though
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for the past 4 years and it's pretty reliable. I use this in my room though, so there's not a huge amount of traffic passing by this. I don't believe there's been any attempts at breaking this, but I like it. It's pretty sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Viola Quach

product_meta.title: Kensington K64637WW ClickSafe Keyed Laptop Lock for Business
product_meta.description:
Size:Standard Cable| Style:BusinessOne click for a secure workplace. The Kensington Click Safe Keyed Laptop Lock is designed for effortless protection of computers and your business's most important data. Locks attach to hardware in a single step. Just one click and it's secure. There's no need for employees to insert a key or follow multiple steps. Click Safe combines a cable made from superior materials with a tamper-proof disc-style lock to deliver the strongest security available in a cable lock. Cable is 5 feet long, 5 mm thick and carbon strengthened for extra protection. 2 keys are included with purchase. The “What’s in the Box” contents include: ClickSafe Security Cable w/Lock 2 Keys attached to Plastic FOB Plastic FOB Holds: 1 Security Anchor 1 Allen Wrench (The allen wrench is small and black, it is found on the backside of the keyring) Instruction Manual

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
feature_bullets: Security in 1-step, simplified design protects computers with a click
Tamperproof, disk-style lock combined with superior materials provide near-impenetrable protection

NOTE: Not compatible with several 2016 Dell laptops and tablets including some Inspiron, Latitude, Venue, XPS, and Chromebook 13 models that use the Noble lock slot. Please review your device’s technical specifications.
